original_title: SUKITA　刻まれたアーティストたちの一瞬
overview: A documentary film about world-renowned Japanese photographer, Masayoshi Sukita, who earned the deep trust and admiration of David Bowie, T-REX, Iggy Pop and big-name artists around the world across an illustrious 40-year career.
title: Sukita: The Shoot Must Go On
